summary.para: The HTTP_REQUEST_V2 structure extends the request structure with more information about the request.
Do not use HTTP_REQUEST_V2 directly in your code; use HTTP_REQUEST instead to ensure that the proper version, based on the operating system the code is compiled under, is used.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_V2.RequestInfoCount
member.summary: The number of structures in the array pointed to by pRequestInfo.

member.name: HTTP_REQUEST_V2.pRequestInfo
member.summary: A pointer to an array of structures that contains additional information about the request.
